episodes.title: Tisch's emails with Epstein justify an 'aggressive investigation' | Pro Football Talk | NFL on NBC
episodes.description:
Mike Florio explains why the NFL has an obligation to investigate New York Giants co-owner Steve Tisch for his email exchanges with Jeffrey Epstein. #NBCSports #NFL #profootballtalk

episodes.description:
Mike Florio sifts through the latest news surrounding Giants co-owner Steve Tisch and his ties to Jeffrey Epstein, sharing why the NFL may have "no choice" to eventually step in. #NBCSports #NFL #ProFootballTalk
